Synopsis: Retrieves information about domain controllers in the specified domain(s).
Description: This function retrieves detailed information about domain controllers in the specified domain(s), including hostname, IP addresses, roles, and other relevant details.
Notes: This function provides essential information about domain controllers in the forest.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-WinADForestControllers -TestAvailability
Tests the availability of domain controllers in the forest.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-WinADDomainControllers
Retrieves information about all domain controllers in the forest.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 3
Examples.Code:
Get-WinADDomainControllers -Credential $Credential
Retrieves information about all domain controllers in the forest using specified credentials.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 4
Examples.Code:
Get-WinADDomainControllers | Format-Table *
Displays detailed information about all domain controllers in a tabular format.
Output:
